page_content: The page discusses regulations and procedures for construction outside building zones.
The page provides information on e-voting in the canton of St. Gallen and links to a guide.
The page serves as a support guide for electronic tax filing for private individuals.
The page provides information for commission members and exam experts at middle schools, including forms and regulations.
The page provides information on ecological contracts for the protection and maintenance of biotopes in the canton of St. Gallen.
The page issues a warning about a new fraudulent scheme involving fake police officers and bank employees asking for remote access to computers.
The page outlines the legal and procedural requirements for construction within building zones in the canton of St. Gallen.
